#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

inline int readFast(){

	register int io = 0;
	register int c = getchar();
	short int flag = 0;
	
	for(;((c < 48 || c > 57) && c != '-'); c = getchar()) ;
	if(c == '-'){
		flag = 1;
		c = getchar();
	}
	
	for(; c > 47 && c < 58; c = getchar()) 
	io = (io << 1 ) + (io << 3) + c - 48;	
	

	return (flag == 1 ? -io : io);
}

inline int gray_decode(int n)
{
	int p = n;
	while(n >>= 1)
		p ^= n;
		
	return p;
}

int main()
{	
	int T,N; T = readFast();
	
	while(T--)
	{
		N = readFast();
		printf("%d\n",gray_decode(N));
		
	}//end while
	
	
	return 0;
	
}//end main
